001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest;
002
003/**
004 * Provides thread-local storage for the current test execution context.
005 *
006 * <p>This class holds a {@code SuperQuest} instance for the current thread,
007 * allowing test components to access the active test context during execution.
008 * It ensures that each thread's execution context remains isolated.
009 *
010 * <p>Use {@code set(...)} to assign the current test context, {@code get()} to retrieve it,
011 * and {@code clear()} to remove it when the test execution is complete.
012 *
013 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
014 */
015public class QuestHolder {
016
017   private static final ThreadLocal<SuperQuest> THREAD_LOCAL_QUEST = new ThreadLocal<>();
018
019
020   private QuestHolder() {
021   }
022
023   /**
024    * Sets the current test execution context.
025    *
026    * @param quest the {@code SuperQuest} instance representing the current test context.
027    */
028   public static void set(SuperQuest quest) {
029      THREAD_LOCAL_QUEST.set(quest);
030   }
031
032   /**
033    * Retrieves the current test execution context.
034    *
035    * @return the {@code SuperQuest} instance associated with the current thread, or {@code null} if not set.
036    */
037   public static SuperQuest get() {
038      return THREAD_LOCAL_QUEST.get();
039   }
040
041   /**
042    * Clears the current test execution context from thread-local storage.
043    */
044   public static void clear() {
045      THREAD_LOCAL_QUEST.remove();
046   }
047
048}
